amendatorysection.para: (1) Commissioned means the wind turbine of a wind generation facility has been in commercial operation for at least twenty-four hours. A wind turbine is not in commercial operation unless the wind energy generation facility is connected to the electrical grid;
(2) Nameplate capacity means the capacity of a wind turbine to generate electricity as measured in megawatts, including fractions of a megawatt; and
(3) Wind energy generation facility means a facility that generates electricity using wind as the fuel source.
